sect2.title: Installation de Kdepim-runtime
sect2.para: Installez kdepim-runtime en exécutant les commandes suivantes :

screen.userinput: mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=&kde-dir; \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -Wno-dev .. && make
